item.title: Hitler's bunker is now just a parking lot. But it's a 'dark tourism' attraction anyway
item.description: Why evil histories sell. A visit to Hitler's bunker, and a deep dive into the economics and ethical quandaries of "dark tourism."

item.title: An ancient disease makes yet another comeback
item.description: Why cholera is striking in Africa. It's a disease that's easy to control with proper treatment. But without medical care, patients can perish quickly.
